overview: Snow Job, the 1969 Don Walters (billed as "Arlo Shiffen") sexploitation movie ("For the girl that's tried everything but skiing!"; "They were cold outside, but hot inside!"; "The ski resort, where every girl got a snow job") starring Cindy Sugar, Eric Manfred, Lena Jacobson, Natalie Nadel, Elvin Hagen, and Alan Marshall
tagline: They were cold outside, but hot inside!
title: Snow Job
